name: Circle of Dreams
description: Druids with ties to the Feywild who use dreamlike magic to heal and protect.

2.name: Balm of the Summer Court
2.description: As a bonus action, heal a creature within 120 feet using a pool of d6s equal to your druid level, granting temporary hit points as well.

6.name: Hearth of Moonlight and Shadow
6.description: During a rest, create a 30-foot sphere that grants +5 to Stealth and Perception and masks light within it.

10.name: Hidden Paths
10.description: Teleport 60 feet as a bonus action or teleport a willing creature 30 feet as an action a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier per long rest.

14.name: Walker in Dreams
14.description: After a short rest, cast dream, scrying, or teleportation circle (to your last long-rest location) once per long rest without expending a slot.
